item.title: Workarounds
item.description: Serial tasks Ansible does not have a out-of-the-box feature which could make possible to run block of tasks in a serial way (the same as you can do with tasks in a playbooks). To owercome this disadvantage you can include the file with serial tasks like this: - name: Run tasks per node in serial mode ansible.builtin.include_tasks: serial_pipe.yml with_items: "{{ groups.all }}" loop_control: loop_var: _host_item when: hostvars[_host_item].inventory_hostname == inventory_hostname
